meanings.sent1: The disorganizations in the office made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent2: Her constant disorganizations led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The disorganizations in his room were so extreme, he couldn't even find his bed!
meanings.sent4: The disorganizations in her mind mirrored the chaos in her surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The disorganizations in the kitchen were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: The act or process of causing disorganization.
meanings.sent1: His constant disorganizations of the files made everyone's work harder.
meanings.sent2: The disorganizations of the schedule resulted in confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: Her disorganizations of the party plans turned the event into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The disorganizations of the project were like a tornado tearing through order.
meanings.sent5: The disorganizations of the classroom setup made learning nearly impossible.
